articles.title: OPINION | Not what the doctor ordered: A retiring nurse looks at what's wrong with primary care | CBC News
articles.description: New Brunswick may have made great gains in many areas of the health-care system, but not in primary care, writes registered nurse Diane Murray. In a column for CBC Opinion, she says the province may have the primary-care system backwards.
